comments.html: Very good point. The "New" tab was designed when I was doing 1 webinar a month and should cover ~2 weeks at the current pace of content publishing (yes, it's getting crazy), but that's definitely way too little. Would it make sense to restructure that tab to show webinars that were changed in the last N months?
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
I have a problem with tracking changes in webminar management system. After login I go to the 'New ' tab and see the last changes. I have to do it every day because I cannot see the history - I can see what happened that fits one page (usually last two updates where an update mean what was published in one day).

I would suggest to add change history tab which covers at least few months i.e. what was updated during a few months.
comments.name: Bogdan Golab

comments.html: In production. Hope you'll like it.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: It would work for me, I guess. You know - just want to track the changes;)
comments.name: Bogdan Golab

comments.html:
Yes, I noticed the change. It's fine for me.

Thank you.
